# GCInputLeftThumbstickButton

**Global Variable**

The name of the left thumbstick button element.

## Declaration

```swift
var GCInputLeftThumbstickButton: String { get }
```

## Related Documentation

- **leftThumbstickButton**: The button on the left thumbstick of the controller.

## Thumbstick names

- **GCInputLeftThumbstick**: The name of the left thumbstick element.
- **GCInputRightThumbstick**: The name of the right thumbstick element.
- **GCInputRightThumbstickButton**: The name of the right thumbstick button element.
